text: Vella is a former municipality in the district Surselva in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013 the former municipalities of Vella, Cumbel, Degen, Lumbrein, Morissen, Suraua, Vignogn and Vrin merged into the new municipality of Lumnezia. Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Vella, Switzerland
